curriculum_identification.title: Master's Level Leadership
curriculum_identification.pathway_position: Core programme in Level 7 Master's Degree in Digital Sustainability Leadership

role_profile.title: Digital Sustainability Leader
role_profile.description: Strategic leader responsible for driving sustainability transformations in organisations by aligning digital tools with environmental goals.
role_profile.professional_context: This curriculum prepares learners to provide advanced leadership for large-scale sustainability transformations and conduct applied research that contributes to the advancement of sustainability practice. Graduates will develop capabilities in strategic research, large-scale change leadership, and innovation in sustainability methodologies. They typically serve as senior executives responsible for transformational sustainability programmes, applied research initiatives, and the development of cutting-edge approaches to organisational sustainability.

ecf_detailed.A.1: IS and Business Strategy Alignment - Level 4

competence_frameworks_alignment.framework_note: Learning outcomes are mapped directly to GreenComp and e-CF framework descriptors

target_audience: Senior leaders and experts seeking master's level expertise in strategic sustainability leadership and large-scale transformation management
learning_approach: EQF Level 7 professional development programme with 110 ECTS, combining theoretical knowledge with practical application through structured learning and standardised work-based learning integration.

assessment_framework.rationale: Master's level programmes require applied research contribution and demonstrated large-scale leadership impact
assessment_framework.wbl_component: Master's level research application and strategic transformation

employer_engagement.feedback_systems: Regular employer feedback on learning outcomes

quality_assurance.monitoring_systems: Regular quality monitoring of WBL delivery

flexible_learning_pathways.modular_design: Learning units designed for flexible recombination
flexible_learning_pathways.competence_catalog: Integrated with competence-based learning unit catalog
flexible_learning_pathways.pathway_flexibility: Multiple entry and exit points available

learning_units.learning_unit_description: Develop holistic strategies for sustainability-focused digital transformation

learning_outcomes.knowledge: Pioneer organisational change methodologies in sustainable digital transformation strategy within professional sustainability practice.
learning_outcomes.skills: Lead transformation transformation leadership in sustainable digital transformation strategy to support organisational sustainability objectives.
learning_outcomes.competence: Lead strategic transformation of strategic leadership responsibilities for sustainable digital transformation strategy while ensuring professional standards and stakeholder value.

learning_units.pathway_guidance: This learning unit forms part of the Core programme in Level 7 Master's Degree in Digital Sustainability Leadership
